title: Conformance with AS/NZS 3000
fullText:
Any room(s) in a principal private residence that is intended for the use of homecare medical electrical equipment shall be wired in accordance with AS/NZS 3000, without conformance with the additional requirements of this Standard, providing that all the medical electrical equipment isâ€”
(a)	internally powered or of Class II; and
(b)	provided with Type BF or Type CF applied parts.
